creator: Rodigast, Samuel
title: Fidus Medicinae Murus
source: Rodigast, Samuel: Fidus Medicinae Murus  Oratione Funebri Memoriae ... Domini Martini Weisii Medicinae Doctoris ... Postridie Idus Martias, A.O.R. MDC.XCIII. In gloriosa senectute placida beataque morte tanquam leni ac dulci somno consopiti atque subsequuto Annunciationis Mariae Festo Berolini ad D. Mariae, honorifice contumulati. Berolini  Berlin 1693
